location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from George F Sadleir [Sadlier] to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that Captain George Forster Sadlier is ready to embark on his journey to Deriah. It further informs the Resident that he should acquaint himself with the content of any dispatches sent between the Captain and the Government in India; it notes that the dispatch boat will be placed under the command of the Captain of the HC Cruizer Vestaland asks that the Resident defray the stated monthly charge.
